Quote.Author: Kamala Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother was and will always remain my greatest hero

Quote.Author: Kamala Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Getting smart on crime' does not mean reducing sentences or punishments for crimes

Quote.Author: Kamala Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that a child going without an education is a crime

Quote.Author: Kamala Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: So many people trip in front of them because they're looking over there or up ahead

Quote.Author: Kamala Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a difficult time sitting down for long periods

Quote.Author: Kamala Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to see and smell and feel the circumstances of people to really understand them

Quote.Author: Kangana Ranaut
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom of being alone is intoxicating

Quote.Author: Kangana Ranaut
Quote.QuoteValue: I would never be able to spend all my life in a busy city like Mumbai

Quote.Author: Kangana Ranaut
Quote.QuoteValue: My biggest asset is that I know how to learn, and that, I believe, will help me in the long run

Quote.Author: Kangana Ranaut
Quote.QuoteValue: I followed my instincts; I followed my intuition, and it paid off

Quote.Author: Kangana Ranaut
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very hard for me to find any sort of shame or blame in my life. I'm not made that way

Quote.Author: Kangana Ranaut
Quote.QuoteValue: Modesty is good. But not when it comes at the cost of honesty

Quote.Author: Kangana Ranaut
Quote.QuoteValue: Sucking up to a director means you are unsure of your talents. I'm not

Quote.Author: Kangana Ranaut
Quote.QuoteValue: Image means a lot. It is everything in the business that we are in

Quote.Author: Kangana Ranaut
Quote.QuoteValue: All beautiful things in this world are because of women

Quote.Author: Kangana Ranaut
Quote.QuoteValue: I dread shooting with animals. I hope I never get a script with snakes

Quote.Author: Kapil Dev
Quote.QuoteValue: Apart from education, you need good health, and for that, you need to play sports

Quote.Author: Kapil Dev
Quote.QuoteValue: If you play good cricket, a lot of bad things get hidden

Quote.Author: Kapil Dev
Quote.QuoteValue: It is always nice when you are honoured. The Lifetime award makes me feel old. I am only 55

Quote.Author: Kapil Dev
Quote.QuoteValue: I think pride is more important sometimes than making money

Quote.Author: Kapil Dev
Quote.QuoteValue: I always breathe cricket

Quote.Author: Kapil Dev
Quote.QuoteValue: Spirituality lies in what you do and how you do it and not what result you get

Quote.Author: Kapil Dev
Quote.QuoteValue: There is inspiration all around us

Quote.Author: Kapil Dev
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't look into negative things. Go past mistakes and look forward

Quote.Author: Kapil Dev
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a naughty kid. Teachers did not like me much

Quote.Author: Kapil Dev
Quote.QuoteValue: When you have to work, work with a smile

Quote.Author: Kapil Sibal
Quote.QuoteValue: Intolerance is alien to Hinduism

Quote.Author: Kapil Sibal
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been writing poetry for a long time now. I started writing in my school days

Quote.Author: Kapil Sibal
Quote.QuoteValue: I would welcome satirical references to political leaders as part of freedom of expression

Quote.Author: Kapil Sibal
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics runs in every human being, and so does music

Quote.Author: Kapil Sibal
Quote.QuoteValue: My voice is not good enough for me to sing a song

Quote.Author: Kapil Sibal
Quote.QuoteValue: We are wedded to freedom of expression and shall do nothing to diminish that freedom

Quote.Author: Kapil Sibal
Quote.QuoteValue: To the youth who have taken up guns, I urge them to return to their parents and shun violence

Quote.Author: Kapil Sibal
Quote.QuoteValue: India should be an exporter of technology

Quote.Author: Kapil Sibal
Quote.QuoteValue: What the government and we in society need to do is to address the issue of gender justice

Quote.Author: Kapil Sibal
Quote.QuoteValue: The fabric of our Constitution and our civilisational culture is based on tolerance

Quote.Author: Kara Swisher
Quote.QuoteValue: As I always like to keep in mind about everything: Don't fight the trend

Quote.Author: Kara Swisher
Quote.QuoteValue: I love all my scoop children. But consistency and persistence is really my aim

Quote.Author: Kara Swisher
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a big proponent of being in touch with everyone even when I do not have a story to ask about

Quote.Author: Kara Swisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Most reporters are so transactional rather than strategic

Quote.Author: Kara Swisher
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think you can look at my history and say they love me to death in Silicon Valley

Quote.Author: Kara Swisher
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm focused on getting to a place where we can prove that journalism can make good money on the web

Quote.Author: Kara Swisher
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't write about Google except to insult the company

Quote.Author: Kara Swisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything is a narrative in life. I learned that early on as a reporter at the 'Washington Post.'

Quote.Author: Kara Swisher
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter how young you are, you're too old for SXSW

Quote.Author: Kara Swisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Wherever you go at SXSW, there you are standing in line. Or watching other people stand in line

Quote.Author: Karan Johar
Quote.QuoteValue: Two powerful people can't be friends

Quote.Author: Karan Johar
Quote.QuoteValue: Throughout my life, I have valued relationships far more than the professionalism

Quote.Author: Karan Johar
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes new voices have the most spectacular vision. It is uncluttered and organic

Quote.Author: Karan Johar
Quote.QuoteValue: Few people know that I love local dhaba food. It is the best!

Quote.Author: Karan Johar
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not embarrassed about who I am. I'm not apologetic

Quote.Author: Karan Johar
Quote.QuoteValue: Honesty is wonderful, but I suspect it's also overrated

Quote.Author: Karan Johar
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, a child means an old-age insurance policy. I have a nurturing quality in me

Quote.Author: Karan Johar
Quote.QuoteValue: Tell me, who doesn't want to have a family to extend himself/herself?

Quote.Author: Karan Johar
Quote.QuoteValue: My father was 40 when he had me, so he was more a grandparent than a parent

Quote.Author: Karan Johar
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel Victoria may have a Secret, but you don't have to know it!

Quote.Author: Karan Mahajan
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a hustling, but also a self-centred vibe you can get from people in Delhi

Quote.Author: Karan Mahajan
Quote.QuoteValue: If Asian America exists, it is because of systemic racism

Quote.Author: Karan Mahajan
Quote.QuoteValue: Asian-Americans are still regarded as 'other' by many of their fellow-citizens

Quote.Author: Karan Mahajan
Quote.QuoteValue: I immigrated to the United States in 2001 for college

Quote.Author: Karan Mahajan
Quote.QuoteValue: I see flaws as a kind of beauty

Quote.Author: Karan Mahajan
Quote.QuoteValue: Literature has become too psychological

Quote.Author: Karan Mahajan
Quote.QuoteValue: I put my thoughts in a book, which must mean I don't want anyone to read them

Quote.Author: Karan Mahajan
Quote.QuoteValue: To live in New York is to see the world as it is to come

Quote.Author: Karan Mahajan
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing about a failure is that it is possible to deny it forever

Quote.Author: Karan Mahajan
Quote.QuoteValue: Terrorists are as torn as anyone else

Quote.Author: Kareem Abdu
Quote.QuoteValue: abbar - You can't win unless you learn how to lose

Quote.Author: Kareem Abdu
Quote.QuoteValue: abbar - I saw Islam as the correct way to live, and I chose to try to live that way

Quote.Author: Kareem Abdu
Quote.QuoteValue: abbar - Yoga is just good for you

Quote.Author: Kareem Abdu
Quote.QuoteValue: abbar - One man can be a crucial ingredient on a team, but one man cannot make a team

Quote.Author: Kareem Abdu
Quote.QuoteValue: abbar - If not for the success that medicine has made, I might be part of a much different story right now

Quote.Author: Kareem Abdu
Quote.QuoteValue: abbar - I think that the good and the great are only separated by the willingness to sacrifice

Quote.Author: Kareem Abdu
Quote.QuoteValue: abbar - I expect more people from China and Asia to end up in the NBA

Quote.Author: Kareem Abdu
Quote.QuoteValue: abbar - I am highly offended by the total lack of acknowledgement of my contribution to Laker success

Quote.Author: Kareem Abdu
Quote.QuoteValue: abbar - The game has basically not changed since I ended my career

Quote.Author: Kareem Abdu
Quote.QuoteValue: abbar - I think I did very well against everyone who tried to defend me

Quote.Author: Karen Elson
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a diary full of lyrics and whatnot and a little voice recorder of guitar riffs

Quote.Author: Karen Elson
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Jen Meyer - she's a dear friend, and Tabitha Simmons as well

Quote.Author: Karen Elson
Quote.QuoteValue: The interesting thing with fashion is that it's really a massive daydream

Quote.Author: Karen Elson
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been writing songs since I was at least 20. That's what I wanted to do before I became a model

Quote.Author: Karen Elson
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a model, you're always the product of somebody else's vision

Quote.Author: Karen Elson
Quote.QuoteValue: I was always the weirdo at school

Quote.Author: Karen Elson
Quote.QuoteValue: I just love vintage. I have far too many vintage dresses

Quote.Author: Karen Elson
Quote.QuoteValue: I would go home and be this insular girl who listened to music and brooded in her bedroom

Quote.Author: Karen Elson
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't just wake up one morning and decide to become a singer-songwriter

Quote.Author: Karen Elson
Quote.QuoteValue: I was always singing as a kid. That's honestly all I've ever wanted to do

Quote.Author: Karen Salmansohn
Quote.QuoteValue: The best things in life are often waiting for you at the exit ramp of your comfort zone

Quote.Author: Karen Salmansohn
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate to wait. When I want something, I want it now

Quote.Author: Karen Salmansohn
Quote.QuoteValue: All my life, my immediate response to emotional pain has been to make jokes. Lots of jokes

Quote.Author: Karen Salmansohn
Quote.QuoteValue: I feared vulnerability more than my actual emotional pain itself!

Quote.Author: Karen Salmansohn
Quote.QuoteValue: In many ways, anger is a misdirected plea for love

Quote.Author: Karen Salmansohn
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever you choose power over love, you will never find true happiness

Quote.Author: Karen Salmansohn
Quote.QuoteValue: Your subconscious's goal is to recreate unresolved childhood issues and then hopefully mend them

Quote.Author: Karen Salmansohn
Quote.QuoteValue: Personally, I believe people who have a lots of memories are people who are living with zest

Quote.Author: Karen Salmansohn
Quote.QuoteValue: Take the time today to understand your contribution to any bad event you've just been through

Quote.Author: Karen Salmansohn
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're human, you've had phases in your life when things are in flux

Quote.Author: Karin Slaughter
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been drawn to historical fiction

Quote.Author: Karin Slaughter
Quote.QuoteValue: I know the cadence of the language and the voice of Atlanta because I've lived here for so long

Quote.Author: Karin Slaughter
Quote.QuoteValue: As a Southerner, I love obstacles for my characters

Quote.Author: Karin Slaughter
Quote.QuoteValue: I read extensively about serial killers and all sorts of things people get up to

Quote.Author: Karin Slaughter
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm on a good go, I can do 12, 13 hours of writing

Quote.Author: Karin Slaughter
Quote.QuoteValue: I could type in a closet and be fine. It's just a matter of cocooning myself. Just me and the story

Quote.Author: Karin Slaughter
Quote.QuoteValue: Feminism has been so co-opted, but the fact is, feminism benefits men as well

Quote.Author: Karin Slaughter
Quote.QuoteValue: I certainly went to high school with some mean girls, and I would not wish that hell on anybody

Quote.Author: Karin Slaughter
Quote.QuoteValue: Even 'Gone With the Wind' had a shocking, cold-blooded murder

Quote.Author: Karin Slaughter
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a lot of men who will say to me, 'I don't read books by women, but I like you.'

Quote.Author: Karl Barth
Quote.QuoteValue: Joy is the simplest form of gratitude

Quote.Author: Karl Barth
Quote.QuoteValue: The best theology would need no advocates; it would prove itself

Quote.Author: Karl Barth
Quote.QuoteValue: It is always the case that when the Christian looks back, he is looking at the forgiveness of sins

Quote.Author: Karl Barth
Quote.QuoteValue: Grace must find expression in life, otherwise it is not grace

Quote.Author: Karl Barth
Quote.QuoteValue: Laughter is the closest thing to the grace of God

Quote.Author: Karl Barth
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith in God's revelation has nothing to do with an ideology which glorifies the status quo

Quote.Author: Karl Barth
Quote.QuoteValue: Conscience is the perfect interpreter of life

Quote.Author: Karl Barth
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith is never identical with piety

Quote.Author: Karl Barth
Quote.QuoteValue: Men have never been good, they are not good and they never will be good

Quote.Author: Karl Barth
Quote.QuoteValue: In the Church of Jesus Christ there can and should be no non-theologians

Quote.Author: Karl Kraus
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is a crutch with which the foolish attack the wise to prove that they are not idiots

Quote.Author: Karl Kraus
Quote.QuoteValue: Stupidity is an elemental force for which no earthquake is a match

Quote.Author: Karl Kraus
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is spectral analysis. Art is light synthesis

Quote.Author: Karl Kraus
Quote.QuoteValue: There are people who can never forgive a beggar for their not having given him anything

Quote.Author: Karl Kraus
Quote.QuoteValue: Matrimony is the union of meanness and martyrdom

Quote.Author: Karl Kraus
Quote.QuoteValue: The mission of the press is to spread culture while destroying the attention span

Quote.Author: Karl Kraus
Quote.QuoteValue: Curses on the law! Most of my fellow citizens are the sorry consequences of uncommitted abortions

Quote.Author: Karl Kraus
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a terrible vision: I saw an encyclopedia walk up to a polymath and open him up

Quote.Author: Karl Kraus
Quote.QuoteValue: Psychoanalysis is that mental illness for which it regards itself as therapy

Quote.Author: Karl Kraus
Quote.QuoteValue: Jealousy is a dog's bark which attracts thieves

Quote.Author: Karl Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: You work for whatever you get in life

Quote.Author: Karl Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes, you follow your dreams. I say to the young people, 'If you have a dream, chase it.'

Quote.Author: Karl Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: Somebody tell the damn players to start playing like old school

Quote.Author: Karl Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll make the right decision, whichever one it is. I have to be 100 percent, not 95 or 99

Quote.Author: Karl Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: Forget the technique. Hit the guy across from you. Don't let somebody come in your space

Quote.Author: Karl Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: I spent a lot of time doing things other people wanted me to do, so I'm doing what I want to do now

Quote.Author: Karl Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't try to do more than you should

Quote.Author: Karl Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: I have my life on a track that I want it on, and I don't want to get off

Quote.Author: Karl Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes people a while to trust you

Quote.Author: Karl Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope I did it the way my peers did it before me. I didn't do anything but try to play hard

Quote.Author: Karl Rove
Quote.QuoteValue: Memo to White House: Calling voters stupid is not a winning strategy

Quote.Author: Karl Rove
Quote.QuoteValue: Ronald Reagan wasn't in the establishment of the Republican Party either, nor was Richard Nixon

Quote.Author: Karl Rove
Quote.QuoteValue: Negative politics have always been around

Quote.Author: Karl Rove
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is a better place with Saddam Hussein gone

Quote.Author: Karl Rove
Quote.QuoteValue: We've been probably to some degree too successful

Quote.Author: Karl Rove
Quote.QuoteValue: Many Democrats have a pre-9/11 worldview

Quote.Author: Karl Rove
Quote.QuoteValue: Mr. Obama has an ingenious approach to job losses: He describes them as job gains

Quote.Author: Karl Rove
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in traditional marriage

Quote.Author: Karl Rove
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not comfortable for me to write about my family. I'm not comfortable writing about me

Quote.Author: Karl Rove
Quote.QuoteValue: If there's a leak out of my administration, I want to know who it is

Quote.Author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel
Quote.QuoteValue: Irony is the form of paradox. Paradox is what is good and great at the same time

Quote.Author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel
Quote.QuoteValue: A so-called happy marriage corresponds to love as a correct poem to an improvised song

Quote.Author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel
Quote.QuoteValue: When reason and unreason come into contact, an electrical shock occurs. This is called polemics

Quote.Author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel
Quote.QuoteValue: Every uneducated person is a caricature of himself

Quote.Author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel
Quote.QuoteValue: Wit as an instrument of revenge is as infamous as art is as a means of sensual titillation

Quote.Author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel
Quote.QuoteValue: He who does not become familiar with nature through love will never know her

Quote.Author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel
Quote.QuoteValue: Mysteries are feminine; they like to veil themselves but still want to be seen and divined

Quote.Author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel
Quote.QuoteValue: A family can develop only with a loving woman as its center

Quote.Author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel
Quote.QuoteValue: Combine the extremes, and you will have the true center

Quote.Author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel
Quote.QuoteValue: Man is a creative retrospection of nature upon itself

Quote.Author: Karlie Kloss
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that taking ballet is one of the best things a girl can do. Period

Quote.Author: Karlie Kloss
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a notebook that is filled to the brim with my dreams and ideas and goals and aspirations

Quote.Author: Karlie Kloss
Quote.QuoteValue: Ballet really taught me so much about the power of movement

Quote.Author: Karlie Kloss
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish I could fly. Or speak fluent Chinese. Both I think are equally impossible

Quote.Author: Karlie Kloss
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to grow thick skin and that only comes with time and learning

Quote.Author: Karlie Kloss
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm somewhat in my own cloud

Quote.Author: Karlie Kloss
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm one of those tall, lanky, awkward kids

Quote.Author: Karlie Kloss
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no time for boys in my life right now

Quote.Author: Karlie Kloss
Quote.QuoteValue: I work strategically with my management team to make all decisions

Quote.Author: Karlie Kloss
Quote.QuoteValue: Whether running, biking, swimming, or dancing, I just like to always be on the move

Quote.Author: Kary Mullis
Quote.QuoteValue: Science grows like a weed every year

Quote.Author: Kary Mullis
Quote.QuoteValue: I can say exactly what I feel about any issue, and I'm going to do that

Quote.Author: Kary Mullis
Quote.QuoteValue: Science consistently produces a new crop of miraculous truths and dazzling devices every year

Quote.Author: Kary Mullis
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is subject to arbitrary fashion

Quote.Author: Kary Mullis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really optimistic in the mornings

Quote.Author: Kary Mullis
Quote.QuoteValue: Law shuttles between freeing us and enslaving us

Quote.Author: Kary Mullis
Quote.QuoteValue: PCR made it easier to see that certain people are infected with HIV

Quote.Author: Kary Mullis
Quote.QuoteValue: The mystery of that damn virus has been generated by the $2 billion a year they spend on it

Quote.Author: Kary Mullis
Quote.QuoteValue: They can't pooh-pooh me now, because of who I am

Quote.Author: Kary Mullis
Quote.QuoteValue: I like writing about biology, not doing it

Quote.Author: Kat Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: My first show was in front of 30,000 people with will.i.am, and I wasn't even that nervous

Quote.Author: Kat Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: You make your mark by being true to who you are and letting that be your staple

Quote.Author: Kat Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: My style is not trendy by any means; my inner artists loves to shine through in my wardrobe

Quote.Author: Kat Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm obsessed with cooking! I want a degree in the culinary arts!

Quote.Author: Kat Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: I am more vintage than I am high fashion

Quote.Author: Kat Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm all about high-waisted pants and skirts, pencil skirts, and sheer, long-sleeves in the summer

Quote.Author: Kat Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: I just don't drink alcohol. I never have; I never will

Quote.Author: Kat Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're cast on 'The Vampire Diaries,' the likelihood of you dying is very good

Quote.Author: Kat Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's important to have your own individual style and sense of self. It's kind of what I do

Quote.Author: Kat Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a smoky eye girl. I love playing with eye colors, metallics... fun stuff!

Quote.Author: Katarina Johnso
Quote.QuoteValue: hompson - I played a lot of football, and I was a goalkeeper, but I didn't really like playing in goal

Quote.Author: Katarina Johnso
Quote.QuoteValue: hompson - Everything happens for a reason - I'm a believer of that for sure

Quote.Author: Katarina Johnso
Quote.QuoteValue: hompson - I like to balance competing with studying. It's hard work at the moment, but it could be worse

Quote.Author: Katarina Johnso
Quote.QuoteValue: hompson - I'm training once a day, four days a week, and just loving life

Quote.Author: Katarina Johnso
Quote.QuoteValue: hompson - Record-breaking is not getting boring. I am definitely happy with that

Quote.Author: Katarina Johnso
Quote.QuoteValue: hompson - That people believe I can be Olympic champ, it just spurs me on

Quote.Author: Katarina Johnso
Quote.QuoteValue: hompson - I can't change my personality. I'll always smile, but I'll be more focused

Quote.Author: Katarina Johnso
Quote.QuoteValue: hompson - I think I rely on my talent more than my brain sometimes

Quote.Author: Katarina Johnso
Quote.QuoteValue: hompson - You can exercise anytime, anywhere. It doesn't have to be the gym

Quote.Author: Katarina Johnso
Quote.QuoteValue: hompson - I've been training quite hard

Quote.Author: Kate Beckinsale
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to say, sushi freaks me out more than almost anything

Quote.Author: Kate Beckinsale
Quote.QuoteValue: I always felt that anorexia was the form of breakdown most readily available to adolescent girls

Quote.Author: Kate Beckinsale
Quote.QuoteValue: If I ever have sex with someone I might be able to develop a sense of humor

Quote.Author: Kate Beckinsale
Quote.QuoteValue: No one is more enslaved than a slave who doesn't think they're enslaved

Quote.Author: Kate Beckinsale
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't go looking to marry an American, it just kinda happened like that

Quote.Author: Kate Beckinsale
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like I've done a bunch of period stuff and then a bunch of romantic comedies

Quote.Author: Kate Beckinsale
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like I'm really lucky

Quote.Author: Kate Beckinsale
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a fan of action movies

Quote.Author: Kate Beckinsale
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't feel very attractive as a child and actually I wasn't

Quote.Author: Kate Beckinsale
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like I flunked at adolescence really badly. I found it really difficult

Quote.Author: Kate Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: No individual, regardless of where they live or whom they love, should suffer discrimination

Quote.Author: Kate Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: John Kitzhaber was a visionary leader for Oregon

Quote.Author: Kate Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: My highest priority is the safety of all Oregonians and their communities

Quote.Author: Kate Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Any threat to the health and safety of a child in any school or classroom is unacceptable

Quote.Author: Kate Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Public health and safety are my highest priorities

Quote.Author: Kate Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: My personal view is that I am opposed to the death penalty

Quote.Author: Kate Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Tackling affordable housing via land use planning won't necessarily solve the problem

Quote.Author: Kate Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I have spent my career fighting to make Oregon a place where everyone can thrive

Quote.Author: Kate Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Every child has a right to learn in an environment that is safe

Quote.Author: Kate Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very committed to stable and adequate funding for education

Quote.Author: Kate Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I think quotes are very dangerous things

Quote.Author: Kate Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not important to me that people understand me

Quote.Author: Kate Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: Clothes are such a strong part of who a human being is

Quote.Author: Kate Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the main reasons for wanting to perform live again was to have contact with that audience

Quote.Author: Kate Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: Thanks to everyone who's encouraged and supported my work over the years

Quote.Author: Kate Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: The freedom you feel when you're actually in control of your own music is fantastic

Quote.Author: Kate Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing, film, sculpture, music: it's all make-believe, really

Quote.Author: Kate Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's important that things are flawed

Quote.Author: Kate Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess what all artists want is for their work to touch someone or for it to be thought provoking

Quote.Author: Kate Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be in a position where I can function as a human being

Quote.Author: Kate Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been an outward rebel, but inside, I just rebel deeply

Quote.Author: Kate Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: Food is not a means toward resolution. It can't cure heartbreak or solve untenable dilemmas

Quote.Author: Kate Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: In the aftermath of a marriage, you feel helpless and hapless

Quote.Author: Kate Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always written about adultery because it raises the question of transgression and trouble

Quote.Author: Kate Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a foodie - I'm an eater: I'm hungry

Quote.Author: Kate Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: I wrote my first story when I was six or seven

Quote.Author: Kate Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: Characters who don't suffer have no interest to me

Quote.Author: Kate Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: It makes you vulnerable to win an award. It's nice to get the attention, but your neck is stuck out

Quote.Author: Kate Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: In literature, older women are not often given center stage

Quote.Author: Kate Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: It's really hard for me, every day, to confront my writing. It never gets easier over time

Quote.Author: Kate Hudson
Quote.QuoteValue: Honesty will never break you

Quote.Author: Kate Hudson
Quote.QuoteValue: Never worry about bad press: All that matters is if they spell your name right

Quote.Author: Kate Hudson
Quote.QuoteValue: I smoke, isn't that terrible?

Quote.Author: Kate Hudson
Quote.QuoteValue: I auditioned on my own. I tried to make a mark for myself without anybody's help, not even Mom's

Quote.Author: Kate Hudson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm superstitious... but not like wear the same underwear for two weeks superstitious

Quote.Author: Kate Hudson
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're nursing and you're working 18-hour days, that's pretty hard

Quote.Author: Kate Hudson
Quote.QuoteValue: The only things I'm competitive in are backgammon and poker

Quote.Author: Kate Hudson
Quote.QuoteValue: Somebody can become a celebrity for being stupid. That is what it's turned into

Quote.Author: Kate Hudson
Quote.QuoteValue: If it's a big hit, fantastic. If it's not, then it's not. I don't worry about my work

Quote.Author: Kate Hudson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not afraid of heights. I rock climb. I can repel off the side of a building

Quote.Author: Kate McKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: Getting recognized on the street is fine, but I never really wanted to be famous

Quote.Author: Kate McKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: I was just never discouraged from doing something wacky like trying to be a comedian

Quote.Author: Kate McKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: A good impression is sort of a juxtaposition of disparate elements

Quote.Author: Kate McKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: I pride myself on being tragically uncool
